title: Iâ€™m sorry.
author: Caddicarus
description:
I spent $10,000 and nearly destroyed my channel. Here's my story. Animation and illustrations by @boymylife , editing/audio/effects by me. Thank you so much, Kyle. This video wouldnâ€™t have been possible without you. https://www.youtube.com/boymylife  https://twitter.com/boymylifeyt  Also, special thanks to LevelUpGaming for stepping in at the last minute to save my video production as quickly as possible! https://www.levelupgaming.co.uk/ â–¼ FOLLOW MY SOCIALS â–¼

PATREON! (early access videos, no ads, credits, exclusive videosâ€¦) = http://www.patreon.com/caddicarus 
TWITCH! = http://www.twitch.tv/Caddicarus
INSTAGRAM! = http://www.instagram.com/caddicarus
LETTERBOXD MOVIE REVIEWS! = http://www.letterboxd.com/Caddicarus
TWITTER! = http://www.twitter.com/Caddicarus
CHEAP GAMES (sometimes less than $1!) EVERY 24 HOURS! = https://caddicarus.chrono.gg/
TUMBLR! = http://thecaddicarus.tumblr.com
FACEBOOK! = http://www.facebook.com/Caddicarus

Don't forget to join the channel right here = https://www.youtube.com/user/Caddicarus?sub_confirmation=1 ğŸ”” AND PLEASE HIT THE NOTIFICATION BELL! ğŸ””

Hello, Iâ€™m Caddicarus. And Iâ€™m sorry. I hope youâ€™re all ready, because youâ€™re about to see my story about the time I spent a ridiculous amount of money on a new PC, only to end up spending even more and nearly losing my channel. I thought Iâ€™d try something animated this time and a lot different - instead of me being on screen, I figured a funny cartoon animation in a similar style to theodd1sout would best illustrate how funny and unlucky this whole saga turned out to be. This is a lot more than a minute-long Caddicarus animated - this is a huge retelling of my story animated, in a special one-off animated story time. Actually, now that I think about it, is it theodd1sout or oddonesout? No clue. Maybe this is closer to Jaiden and their animations. Jaidenanimations? Jaidenanimation? Iâ€™m completely new to this story time animated kind of video, Iâ€™m a bit of touch. How about JelloApocolypse? I dunno, Iâ€™m totally lost. Either way - with special thanks to boymylife - I hope you enjoy my true story all about my how to build a PC teaching went entirely wrong. Gaming PC build s are a nightmare, and hereâ€™s why. And yes, I not only managed to get an NVIDIA RTX 3080 PC for my office, but an RTX 3090 for the streaming and recording PC too. Iâ€™m lucky. But not that lucky. Prebuilt PCâ€™s, build your own PC, everything is covered here.


Caddicarus 8bit themes by Endigo = https://www.youtube.com/user/Endigo

Caddicarus logo by Jan Animation = https://www.youtube.com/user/jananimationstudios/videos

Kevin MacLeod's royalty free music! = http://incompetech.com

OLLY'S CAMERA WORK! = https://www.youtube.com/SuperOllyRoss


Watch more storytime animation videos and comedy game reviews on my channel! | Caddicarus

https://www.youtube.com/user/Caddicarus

#Storytime #Animated #Cartoon #Caddicarus #PCBuild #Gaming
